Ikot Abasi is located in the south west corner of Akwa Ibom State, Nigeria
Ókè ya bụ mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Oruk Anam nke dị n'ebe ugwu, Mkpat Enin na okpuru ọchịchị ime ọwụwa anyanwụ Obolo n'ọwụwa anyanwụ yana oke osimiri Atlantic dị na ndịda
Osimiri Imo bụ oke eke dị na ọdịda anyanwụ nke kewapụrụ ya na steeti Rivers
